Package net.proteusframework.core.locale

Localization related classes.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    GlobalizationContext
    i18n and l10n context for a web request.
    LocaleContextSource
    Indicates that an class can provide a LocaleContext.
    LocaleSource
    Implementations of this interface store, update, retrieve, and remove LocalizedObjects.
    LocaleSourceListener
    A listener for when LocalizedObjects are changed.
    LocalizationInputProvider
    Persistence provider for localization input.
    LocalizedObject
    Base interface for all classes that handle localization in MIWT.
    NamedObject
    Interface for Objects that have names and optionally also descriptions.
    TextSource
    Source of LocalizedText.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractLocalizedObject
    Base class for classes that handle localization in MIWT.
    JDBCLocaleSource
    Implementation of LocaleSource that stores localized information in a database via JDBC.
    LocaleContext
    The LocaleContext holds the current locale information and keeps a registry of LocalizedObject instances that are updated by calling LocalizedObject.localeChanged(LocaleContext) when the locale is changed.
    LocalizationInputHelper
    Utility for localization input.
    LocalizationInputProviderImpl
    Default implementation of LocalizationInputProvider.
    LocalizedLocale
    LocalizedObject implementation that returns the language as the value.
    LocalizedNamedObjectComparator
    Compares LocalizedNamedObject by name property.
    LocalizedObjectChangedEvent
    An event signifying that a LocalizedObject has been changed.
    LocalizedObjectKey
    Wrapper class for the benefit of identifying the objects that are LocalizedObject keys.
    LocalizedObjectKeyBeanInfo
    Bean info.
    LocalizedObjectKeyComparator
    Comparator for LocalizedObjectKey.
    LocalizedObjectKeyEditor
    Editor for LocalizedObjectKey.
    LocalizedText
    A LocalizedObject that contains one text value.
    LocalizedTextBeanInfo
    BeanInfo for LocalizedText.
    NamedObjectComparator
    Compares NamedObject by name property.
    OptionallyLocalizedNamedObjectComparator
    Compares OptionallyLocalizedNamedObject by name property.
    ResourceBundleAdapter
    Adapter class for property file resource bundles.
    ResourceBundleLocalizedText
    A localized text object that updates the text from a resource bundle.
    TextSources
    TextSource factory.
    TransientLocalizedObjectKey
    LocalizedObjectKey with localizations stored in memory.
    TransientLocalizedObjectKeyBeanInfo
    BeanInfo.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    LocalizedObjectChangedEvent.ChangeType
    Change Type.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    LocaleSourceException
    Indicates an error accessing a LocaleSource.

Package net.proteusframework.core.locale Description

Localization related classes.
